sentences.en: All a dust and athirst, the two entered the wine - shop.
sentences.cn: 两人满身灰尘走进酒店, 十分口渴.

sentences.en: And let him that is athirst come.
I am athirst for faraway things.
I am restless. I am athirst for faraway things.
sentences.cn: 我心绪不宁. 我渴望着遥远的事物.

sentences.en: I will give unto him that is athirst of the fountain of the water of life freely.
sentences.cn: 我要将生命泉的水白白赐给那口渴的人喝。

sentences.en: I will give unto him that is athirst of the fountain of water of life freely.
sentences.cn: 我是创始的,也是成终的.我要把生命的泉水,白白赐给口渴的人喝.
